file_content.text: Mighty Admiral Ivernus... Murghir shivers with anticipation!
You please Murghir's master so much! Murghir is so jealous.
Murghir hopes you kill many of master's enemies.
Murghir thinks Colicoid goo smells! Murghir glad master stayed here with her.
Colicoids sound scary! Murghir wishes master would hold her safe.
Murghir is glad master's friend is not hurt!
You get to serve master! You are so lucky! Murghir's master is generous!
Master will scold Murghir for distracting you. Murghir begs you speak with master.
Murghir is honored to meet guests!
Murghir hopes she is found pleasing.
Murghir lives to serve her master.
Murghir is fortunate to serve so powerful a master.
Murghir hopes never to displease her master.
